etc.aloe.cscw2013
Class ThresholdSegmentation

java.lang.Object
  etc.aloe.cscw2013.ThresholdSegmentation
All Implemented Interfaces:
Segmentation
public class ThresholdSegmentation
extends java.lang.Object
implements Segmentation

Segments messages according to a time threshold. Messages separated by more than the threshold go into different segments. Can optionally separate messages by participant as well. In order for labels to be applied to segments, be sure to set the segment resolution procedure.
